full_text: Pfizer and Moderna, which developed the same type of vaccine, announced efficacy rates of 94-95%. AstraZeneca says its vaccine was 79% effective at preventing symptomatic covid-19 https://t.co/AbK0eO4WYl

localize.full_text: 开发同类型疫苗的辉瑞公司和Moderna公司公布的疗效率为94-95%。阿斯利康公司称，其疫苗在预防症状性covid-19 https://t.co/AbK0eO4WYl，有效率为79%。
開發同類型疫苗的輝瑞公司和Moderna公司公佈的療效率爲94-95%。阿斯利康公司稱，其疫苗在預防症狀性covid-19 https://t.co/AbK0eO4WYl，有效率爲79%。
